name: Jean: The Servant of Light
description:
Description
This game is a 2D metroidvania platformer game that focused on platforming and obstacle avoiding aspect. For this game jam, I  created short one level with one boss stage.
Player can do melee attack or cast the time stopping ability with cost of the character's life. 

This game is submitted in the CSUI Individual Game Jam of 2020 and includes three diversifier provided by the game jam:

  • Night Of Fire
      Boss stage with time limit. Player must defeat the boss, before the boss kills the princess
  • The World
      Time stopping ability with the cost of character's HP. This ability has cooldown rate so there must be delay between one cast to another
  • I can't punch you without getting closer
     Player can do melee attack on the ground or in the air. Player can also do air slam attack

Synopsis
The story revolves around a young boy named Jean that lived in Kingdom of Francia. He didn't bear any royalty bloodline at all,  but due to his dedication in military & loyalty to the kingdom, he became King Roger's most trusted knight. King Roger was King of the Kingdom of Francia at that time. 

The earth had three ruling kingdoms.  There were Kingdom of Francia which ruled the northern part of earth,  Kingdom of Burgee which ruled the eastern part of earth, and Duchy of Halsuis which ruled the southern part of earth. Those three kingdoms
cooperated together to maintain order & peace in the earth.  However, those centuries of peace didnt last long until a Mysterious Dark Lord named Darkbringer
and his dark forces arised from the underworld and wiped out the entire earth. Only several Kingdom of Francia remained which include Jean, King Roger, Princess Eris(Princess of Kingdom of Francia), several royalties, and several folks of Kingdom of Francia.

Depressed with this situation, King Roger decided to go to Temple of Chromus to find Chromus guidance/blesssing. Suddenly Chromus (The God of Light) appeared and gave King Robert a fraction of power from him which included The Sword of Light (which can kill dark force easily) and time-stopping ability (absorb several life from its user everytime it's casted). Chromus asked King Robert to protect Princess Eris at all cost,  because Chromus sealed the power of Ragnarok inside the Eris. Ragnarok could be casted by Eris or Darkbringer, but the problem is Eris had to come to age in order to cast that power and if that power fell into the Darkbringer, the world would be destroyed by Darkbringer. On other hand, if that power casted by Eris together with "Servant of Light", it could destroy Darkbringer & dark forces for good & bring out the light on the world.  King Roger accepted that responsibility & power and became the "servant of light", humanity's last hope. Not long after, however, King Roger suddenly got ill, and bestowed his power, responsibility & title to Jean, his most trusted knight before dying.  To make thing worse, Princess Eris was missing.

Jean asked the informant the whereabout of Princess Eris, and it lead to "Darkbringer's lair". Raiding the lair alone and fueled by his sense of duty, he must save Princess Eris at all cost. The lair was filled with many dark force troops  and trap. Can he save Princess Eris in time?

Control
Left-Right key: Move the character horizontally
Down+Left/Right (In the ground): Slide
Up key: Jump
X: Melee attack
(While in the air) Down key (hold) + X: Air slam attack
C: Time stop ability
Q: Use potion to heal

Esc: Goto pause menu
